mapper.select: select id, isbn, name, sub_name, origin_name, publisher_id, producer_id, book_group_id, bind_id, paper_id, publish_time, publish_batch, print_time, print_batch, page_count, word_count, score, price, size_length, size_width, print_sheet, language, fit_age_min, fit_age_max, create_time, update_time, del_flag from meta_book where id = #{id} and del_flag = 0
mapper.insert: insert into meta_book(isbn, name, sub_name, origin_name, publisher_id, producer_id, book_group_id, bind_id, paper_id, publish_time, publish_batch, print_time, print_batch, page_count, word_count, score, price, size_length, size_width, print_sheet, language, fit_age_min, fit_age_max, create_time, update_time, del_flag) values (#{isbn}, #{name}, #{subName}, #{originName}, #{publisherId}, #{producerId}, #{bookGroupId}, #{bindId}, #{paperId}, #{publishTime}, #{publishBatch}, #{printTime}, #{printBatch}, #{pageCount}, #{wordCount}, #{score}, #{price}, #{sizeLength}, #{sizeWidth}, #{printSheet}, #{language}, #{fitAgeMin}, #{fitAgeMax}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag})

(#{entity.isbn}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.subName}, #{entity.originName}, #{entity.publisherId}, #{entity.producerId}, #{entity.bookGroupId}, #{entity.bindId}, #{entity.paperId}, #{entity.publishTime}, #{entity.publishBatch}, #{entity.printTime}, #{entity.printBatch}, #{entity.pageCount}, #{entity.wordCount}, #{entity.score}, #{entity.price}, #{entity.sizeLength}, #{entity.sizeWidth}, #{entity.printSheet}, #{entity.language}, #{entity.fitAgeMin}, #{entity.fitAgeMax}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.delFlag})

update meta_book
isbn = #{isbn},
name = #{name},
sub_name = #{subName},
origin_name = #{originName},
publisher_id = #{publisherId},
producer_id = #{producerId},
book_group_id = #{bookGroupId},
bind_id = #{bindId},
paper_id = #{paperId},
publish_time = #{publishTime},
publish_batch = #{publishBatch},
print_time = #{printTime},
print_batch = #{printBatch},
page_count = #{pageCount},
word_count = #{wordCount},
score = #{score},
price = #{price},
size_length = #{sizeLength},
size_width = #{sizeWidth},
print_sheet = #{printSheet},
language = #{language},
fit_age_min = #{fitAgeMin},
fit_age_max = #{fitAgeMax},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update meta_book set del_flag = 1 where id = #{id}
